attributes.action: Stop the use of "police vehicle only" points along motorways being used by motorway service vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that every time i drive along any motorway in the country that have parking spots for "police vehicles only" I almost invariably see one of those police look a like motorway service vehicles parked up in a "police only" place. Don`t say its for there own safety while there having a brake, After all if i stopped for a brake there you can be 100% sure i`d end up in court. Personally i think its because those who do it like to see everyone braking when there spottered. You know the thing "look at me I'm the all powerful one"
